text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK
THE STATE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT
ALBANY, NEW YORK 12224
DIVISION OF EDUCATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS
LEE E. CAMPION, director
GR 4-5974
March 24, 1964
Miss Marion Corwell
Chairman, Public Relations Committee
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Ave., N.W.
Washington, D. C.
Dear Marion:
I have not received a reply to my December 3, 1963
letter inquiring about the Committee Meeting held in
Milwaukee on November 20, 1963.
If I am to serve on the Public Relations Committee
effectively, I will need to be brought up-to-date on what
is being discussed.
Would you please keep me informed.
Director
LEC:rt
